name: AIA_RULE_Operation_ExamineFieldDisplay
description: Display the rule parameters in a pretty print manner.
sail_code:
{
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
    style: "STRONG",
    text: ri!logicalExpression.fieldKey & " ",
  ),
  displayvalue(
    ri!logicalExpression.ruleOperator,
    rule!AIA_RULE_ENUM_Operators().operator,
    rule!AIA_RULE_ENUM_Operators().label,
    ri!logicalExpression.ruleOperator
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
    style: "STRONG",
    text: " " & ri!logicalExpression.value,
    showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!logicalExpression.value)
  ),
}
